name: graphql-service
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.build: (cd apollo && npm run build) && sam build
scripts.start: npm run build && sam local start-api -p 4000
scripts.deploy:live: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env live
scripts.typecheck: (cd apollo && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../payment-service && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../auth-service && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../fastchargeapi-cli && npm run typecheck) && (cd ../gateway-service && npm run typecheck) && echo All good!
scripts.crosscheck: (cd apollo && npm run test) && (cd ../payment-service && npm run test) && (cd ../auth-service && npm run test) && (cd ../cli && npm run test) && (cd ../gateway-service && npm run test) && echo All good!
